document.masterDocTitle: A review of the species of the tribe Chorosomatini of China (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Rhopalidae)

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 18–20.
Chorosoma schillingii (Schilling, 1829)
.
Female voucher specimen from Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang (IZAS). 18, dorsal view; 19, ventral view; 20, posterior surface of right hind leg. Scales in mm.
